page.title: 05A BAYSTON HILL PUB
page.content: The Beeches public house has a variety of clubs.There are darts, dominoes and football teams. There are two darts teams, A and B. They play every Monday evening during the season. They play in the Shrewsbury District darts League in division 3. 8 players play in league matches and 9 in cup matches.When A plays at home B plays away.Own transport or a coach is used for away matches.They play 33 matches in a season. The dominoes team meets every Wednesday and plays in Shrewsbury domino league, division 6. There are 8 members in a league team and 8 in a cup team. The Brewery supplies the dominoes and tables. The football team plays every Saturday during the season in Shropshire and Shrewsbury district league
